title: White House support for 2024 film "Air Force One Down"

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any documents pertaining to collaboration between the Office of Public Engagement, White House (OPE), and the production of the 2024 movie "Air Force One Down," directed by James Bamford and starring Anthony Michael Hall. I request any and all documents pertaining to OPE involvement with the production of "Air Force One Down." Such documents may include but should not be limited to: script notes; production assistance agreements; and all records of communications between employees of OPE and members of the cast, crew, and production company of "Civil War," including memos, notes of meetings and conference calls, emails, and other forms of communication.

I am the Director of Research Operations at a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization called The Decoding Culture Foundation. These documents will be used for public education and research purposes. I therefore request a waiver of all fees that may otherwise apply. Attached is a document with organization letterhead confirming my position, as well as the organization's 501(c)(3) application and approval form.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Brett Carollo

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

- Privacy Impact Assessments for the USPS Commercial Mail Receiving Agency Customer Registration Database (CMRA CRD)
- List of agencies that have initiated inquiries into the CMRA CRD for FY23 and FY24
- Current forms used for government agencies to request information contained within the CMRA CRD
- Total number of inquiries made into the CMRA CRD by law enforcement agencies and other governmental entities for FY23 and FY24
- Total number of individuals with access to the CMRA CRD as of the date this request is processed (non-CMRAs)

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Dwight Pina

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: AAM-300 Transparency
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

- List of names, job titles, internal specialty of employees and contractors working within the FAA Aerospace Medical Certification Division (AAM-300)
- List of names of individuals with authority delegated to them by the Manager of AAM-300, David O’Brien
- Any internal studies verifying the efficacy of the CogScreen-AE
- Total number of deferred medical certificates for FY23 (1st, 2nd, 3rd classes)
- Total number of Special Issuances issued for FY23
- Total number of outstanding deferrals within AAM-300 as of the date this FOIA request is processed
- Copies of Memorandums of Understanding (MOUs) between the FAA, Veterans Affairs, and the Social Security Administration for information-sharing of disability benefits
- List of names, job titles, internal specialty of employees and contractors working within the FAA Special Projects division
- Establishing documents of the FAA Special Projects division

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Dwight Pina
